response.overview: College is far more than beer bashes and sex romps, cute hook-ups and classes. It can also be the seamiest and strangest place to finally grow up. That's what a freshman, Jack Wesson, discovers when he graduates and attends a university, where hard drugs and mind-bending relationships usher him into the hard knocks of adulthood. Having completely lost control of his life, Jack must claw his way back to solid ground.
response.title: April Is My Religion
